name: Super Chef Restaurant - Food Court Pizza Fever
name_original: Super Chef Restaurant - Food Court Pizza Fever
description:
Make and cook delicious lunches!!
Prepare and strength the dough and bake it.
You can make your Pizza the way you want to with animations.
Make Pizza of your choice.
We have the option of vegetable, meat, beef Pizza as well.

How to play
- Choose the shape of Pizza
- Prepare the dough and bake it
- Put the option in the slices and add sauce, cheese and salad
- Pizza is ready for you

Feature in this food game
- This game is easy tap and drag game play.
- Kids and toddlers friendly content
- Show a guide to make Pizza
- Contains family content
- Cool background music and high quality graphics

Develop your child mind, spatial skills, self-esteem, sagacity and memory skills.
A great learning experience for every baby and kids
The fun filled Sandwich maker game now with improved.
